references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces NeRF, a foundational work in neural rendering that uses neural networks to represent 3D scenes as continuous functions, enabling novel view synthesis.

references.paper_title: Instant neural graphics primitives with a multiresolution hash encoding
references.reason: This paper introduces a highly efficient and scalable method for neural rendering using instant neural graphics primitives, which significantly improves rendering speed and quality.

references.paper_title: Neus: Learning neural implicit surfaces by volume rendering for multi-view reconstruction
references.reason: This paper introduces the NeuS method, which combines neural implicit surfaces and volume rendering for high-fidelity multi-view reconstruction, improving the accuracy and detail of reconstructed scenes.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian splatting, a novel technique that uses 3D Gaussian primitives for high-quality and efficient neural rendering, achieving state-of-the-art results.

references.paper_title: Scaffold-GS: Structured 3D Gaussians for view-adaptive rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces Scaffold-GS, which improves upon 3D Gaussian splatting by enhancing scene structure fidelity and robustness to view-dependent effects, leading to better rendering quality.
